description: terrified young girl with curly dark hair, crouching on one knee in LRC while pushing away a black cloaked figure rushing toward her, with one hand on her head and one hand on her chin

title: Ilustración para un Cuento (Illustration for a Story), plate 11 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
